code: import React from'react';import{Line}from'react-chartjs-2';import'chart.js/auto';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CryptoChart=_ref=>{let{data,interval}=_ref;const chartData={labels:data.map(point=>new Date(point[0]).toLocaleString()),datasets:[{label:'Bitcoin Price (USD)',data:data.map(point=>point[1]),fill:false,backgroundColor:'#61dafb',borderColor:'#61dafb',tension:0.1}]};const chartOptions={responsive:true,maintainAspectRatio:false,scales:{x:{ticks:{color:'#61dafb'},grid:{color:'#61dafb'}},y:{ticks:{color:'#61dafb'},grid:{color:'#61dafb'}}},plugins:{legend:{labels:{color:'#61dafb'}},tooltip:{enabled:true,backgroundColor:'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)',titleColor:'#39ff14',bodyColor:'#39ff14',footerColor:'#39ff14'}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:chartData,options:chartOptions})});};export default CryptoChart;
